#summary How to release a new version of Schoorbs
#labels Phase-Deploy,Phase-Implementation,Phase-Support

= Things to do before releasing =

  * Make sure that there are no open bugs for the upcoming release
  * Make sure all unit-tests run without a problem

= Things to do while releasing =
 
 * Build a zip- and a 7z-archive of Schoorbs -> `rake release`
 * Build Debian and Ubuntu Packages of Schoorbs -> `rake debian:binary:fakeroot`
 * Upload those packages
 * Announce on [http://xhochy.org/en xhochy.org/en]
 * Announce on [http://xhochy.com xhochy.com]
 * Announce on [https://launchpad.net/schoorbs/+announce Launchpad]
 * Announce on [http://groups.google.com/group/xy-announce XhochY Announce]
 * Announce on [http://groups.google.com/group/schoorbs-general-discussion Schoorbs general discussion]
 * Announce on [http://schoorbs.xhochy.com the Schoorbs Website]
 * Announce on [http://freshmeat.net/projects/schoorbs Freshmeat] and add this release
 * Update the [http://www.hotscripts.com/Detailed/78727.html Hotscripts listing]
 * Check data on [http://www.ohloh.net/projects/12616 Ohloh] (Announcements to this site are made via the Launchpad Announce Feed)
